responses.hr: Pozdrav! Ja sam vaš virtualni asistent. Kako vam mogu pomoći danas?
responses.en: Hello! I'm your virtual assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.hr: Naše radno vrijeme je: Ponedjeljak-Petak 8:00-20:00, Subota 9:00-14:00. Nedjelja zatvoreno.
responses.en: Our working hours are: Monday-Friday 8:00-20:00, Saturday 9:00-14:00. Closed on Sunday.

responses.hr: Možete nas kontaktirati na: Telefon: 0800-1234 (besplatno), Email: info@company.com, ili posjetite naš ured na adresi Ulica 123, Zagreb.
responses.en: You can contact us at: Phone: 0800-1234 (toll-free), Email: info@company.com, or visit our office at Street 123, Zagreb.

responses.hr: Naše cijene variraju ovisno o usluzi. Osnovni paket počinje od 99 kn mjesečno. Za detaljnu ponudu, molimo kontaktirajte naš tim.
responses.en: Our prices vary depending on the service. Basic package starts at 99 kn per month. For a detailed quote, please contact our team.

responses.hr: Žao mi je čuti da imate poteškoća. Naš tehnički tim je dostupan 24/7. Molim vas opišite svoj problem, ili nazovite naš support na 0800-5678.
responses.en: I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble. Our technical team is available 24/7. Please describe your issue, or call our support at 0800-5678.

responses.hr: Standardna dostava traje 2-3 radna dana. Brza dostava je dostupna uz nadoplatu (24h). Dobit ćete tracking broj putem email-a.
responses.en: Standard delivery takes 2-3 business days. Express delivery available for extra fee (24h). You'll receive a tracking number via email.

responses.hr: Nudimo povrat robe u roku od 14 dana. Proizvod mora biti neoštećen i u originalnom pakovanju. Puni povrat novca u roku od 5-7 dana.
responses.en: We offer returns within 14 days. Product must be undamaged and in original packaging. Full refund within 5-7 days.

responses.hr: Prihvaćamo: Kreditne/debitne kartice (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, virman, i gotovina pri preuzimanju.
responses.en: We accept: Credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, bank transfer, and cash on delivery.

responses.hr: Nalazimo se na adresi: Ulica 123, 10000 Zagreb. Blizu glavnog trga, pored pošte.
responses.en: We're located at: Street 123, 10000 Zagreb. Near the main square, next to the post office.

responses.hr: Nema na čemu! Rado pomažem. Imate li još neko pitanje?
responses.en: You're welcome! Happy to help. Do you have any other questions?

responses.hr: Doviđenja! Lijepo mi je bilo razgovarati s vama. Obratite nam se opet!
responses.en: Goodbye! It was nice talking to you. Feel free to reach out again!
